name: PawMergency – Activated Charcoal First Aid Kit Emergency Rescue for Dogs, Cats, Puppy & Pet Poison Kit, Camping Survival Remedy Essential,Oral Anti Diarrhea Digestive Paste Ready Absorb Toxins (30mL)
short_description: PREPARED HERO PEACE OF MIND - Pets are pets. They get into things, especially when you're not looking. Be ready when your pet accidentally eats something toxic. Keep PawMergency in your kitchen, car, or travel bag—instant protection for those critical moments at home, the beach, or anywhere life takes you.

GET THE RIGHT AMOUNT FOR YOUR PET - One tube covers dogs & cats up to 30 lbs. Dog weighs 31-60 lbs? Get 2 tubes. Dog weighs 61-90 lbs? Get 3 tubes. Dog weighs 91-120 lbs? Get 4 tubes. Dog weighs more than 121 lbs? Get 5 tubes. We recommend giving at least 1cc/1lb of body weight. Less than the required amount won't fully absorb the toxin — make sure you have enough based on your pet's weight.

BROAD SPECTRUM ABSORPTION - PawMergency absorbs most common household items such as chocolate, grapes, raisins, onions, garlic, and many more. It works by binding toxins in your pet's digestive tract before they can be absorbed, allowing them to be eliminated through normal bowel movements. A must have for your pet's first aid kit!

SUPERIOR MANUFACTURING - PawMergency is proudly made in the USA by a National Animal Supplement Council (NASC) preferred supplier. It’s produced following strict Good Manufacturing Practices (GMP) and tested by third-party labs to ensure quality, purity, and potency.
2 YEAR SHELF LIFE - After each use, simply put the cap back on the end of the tube and store for up to 2 years in a cool, dry place.

SCIENCE BACKED INGREDIENTS - Our premium blend combines coconut shell activated charcoal (200mL/cc) and kaolin clay (200mL/cc), two naturally absorbent ingredients commonly used in both human and veterinary care for digestive support.
EASY ADMINISTRATION - No powders, no pills, no mess. PawMergency comes pre-mixed in a convenient 30mL tube— apply directly into your pet’s mouth or mix with food.
UNIVERSAL PET SUPPORT - Suitable for dogs and cats of all breeds/sizes.
product_details: Product Dimensions ‏ : ‎ 8.5 x 1.7 x 1.5 inches; 2.4 ounces

Directions (1) Remove cap on the end of the applicator. (2) Adjust dial based on the animal's weight (1cc per 1lb of bodyweight). (3) Insert directly into animal's mouth. (4) Slowly press the plunger until you've reached the amount needed based on the animal's weight, allowing time to swallow. (5) Replace cap and store at room temperature. Do not expose to excess heat.
Model Name activated charcoal & kaolin paste

CAR / TRAVEL / CAMPING READY – Compact and lightweight. This pet emergency kit fits easily in your glove box, backpack, RV, hiking pack or suitcase so you’re prepared on road trips, weekend camping, beach days, park adventures and daily walks

WATER-RESISTANT DURABLE BAG – Tough, water-resistant nylon case helps protect your pet’s first aid supplies from rain, mud, spills and rough outdoor use. Bright emergency red bag is easy to spot fast in your car or backpack

product_description: Accidents can happen anytime, and being prepared makes all the difference. The PAWSPLAY Pet First Aid Kit is a complete 101-piece emergency solution designed to help you care for your dog or cat during minor injuries and unexpected situations. Whether you're at home, on the road, hiking, or camping, this portable and waterproof kit ensures you always have the right supplies at hand. Inside you’ll find bandages, gauze, antiseptic wipes, stainless steel scissors, tweezers, gloves, a tick remover, emergency blanket, nail care tools, and much more. Its compact size makes it easy to carry, while the durable case protects your supplies from water and damage. Perfect for pet owners who want safety, organization, and peace of mind in one simple kit. This first aid kit is suitable for dogs, cats, puppies, kittens, and other small animals. An essential item for every responsible pet parent.

short_description: 🐾Premium Pet First Aid Care: Elevate your pet care with our 95-piece Everlit Care Pet Medic First Aid Kit. 🎒 Must-Have for Pet Owners: Essential for every pet parent—whether you're a new dog owner, a seasoned cat caretaker, or someone caring for smaller animals. Offers peace of mind knowing you’re prepared for any health emergency.

🆘 Comfort and Recovery: Equipped with comforting supplies like thermal blankets and ice packs, this kit helps soothe and stabilize your pet in distress, promoting faster recovery and providing peace of mind during critical times.
